name: Godwin's Letter
desc: A love letter from Godwin to Glory detailing their love and the intimate things they did, which would make any reader blush. However, only the last part is somewhat memorable.

desc.text: The stone peaks in Liyue have attracted the attention of many knights, but I'm not a fan of them. Stone is rough, and scratches the hands. Instead, I like a kind of flower known as the Silk Flower. It has a fine texture and gives off a faint aroma. If I weren't so far away, I would bring some back for you. I bet you would love them.
